name: Oracle
queryCode:
SELECT
  t1.BSCOPE,
  t1.CREATEDATE,
  t1.CREATEMAN,
  t1.DCSYSTEMID,
  t31.DCSYSTEMNAME,
  t1.DEPTBC,
  t1.DEPTDR,
  t1.DYNAINSTID,
  t1.ISALLDATA,
  t1.ENABLEDEPTBC,
  t1.ENABLEDEPTDR,
  t1.ENABLEORGDR,
  t1.ENTITYID,
  t11.ENTITYNAME,
  t1.ORGDR,
  t1.PERMISSIONTAG,
  t1.PERMISSIONTYPE,
  t1.PSSYSTEMID,
  t1.PSYS_PERMISSIONID,
  t21.SYS_PERMISSIONNAME AS PSYS_PERMISSIONNAME,
  t1.SYSTEMFLAG,
  t1.SYS_PERMISSIONID,
  t1.SYS_PERMISSIONNAME,
  t1.UPDATEDATE,
  t1.UPDATEMAN
FROM
  IBZPERMISSION t1
  LEFT JOIN IBZENTITY t11
    ON t1.ENTITYID = t11.ENTITYID
  LEFT JOIN IBZPERMISSION t21
    ON t1.PSYS_PERMISSIONID = t21.SYS_PERMISSIONID
  LEFT JOIN IBZDCSYSTEM t31
    ON t1.DCSYSTEMID = t31.DCSYSTEMID
  LEFT JOIN IBZROLE_PERMISSION T2
    ON t2.SYS_PERMISSIONID = t1.SYS_PERMISSIONID
  LEFT JOIN IBZUSER_ROLE T3
    ON t2.SYS_ROLEID = t3.SYS_ROLEID
  LEFT JOIN IBZROLE T4
    ON T4.SYS_ROLEID = T3.SYS_ROLEID
